name: Reptoid Rampage
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by Kimari Rennis, Lily Cheng, and Jivan Minifee

"The scientific achievements  and advances or society have backfired. New, genetically engineered creatures decide to rebel against humanity. It is your job to work with the other monsters to conquer the human race. You will be playing as a chicken dragon and will be defending yourself against these humans by breathing fire."

To move - W A S D

To breathe fire - spacebar
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
